page.title: 12Biography-Faversham Child
page.content: {Dominic's Day} ................ I am seven years of age,my name is Dominic Davies. I live at 6 School Road,Faversham,Kent. I live with my Mum and Dad. I enjoy playing games like SNOOKER and DARTS. I have got blue eyes,light brown hair and a cheeky grin and am 130cm. tall. On Monday,22nd. of July 1985 our class went to the Maison Dieu we saw a skeleton and big a big pot that had been put together. There were lots of fossils,pottery,jewelry and many other interesting objects. Mr.Santer,the curator told us about the local history of the area. He said that the Maison Dieu used to be a resting place and hospital for pilgrims travelling to Canterbury Cathedral with a special room for the Kings. {Dominic Davies
